Text: if you get an error with DOWNLOAD THIS TORRENT link, you can try MAGNET LINK

this is probably a stupid question...  how can i download using Magnet Link?  when i clicked on the Magnet Link, it said "Firefox does not know how to open this address, because the protocol isn't associated with any program."

is there something i need to install first?  i'm using uTorrent on Mac running Firefox.

kabubuki,

In your Firefox:

Tools - Options - Applications - in Content Type column search for "magnet" and in Action change for "use uTorrent".

kabubuki,

or just right click at the "magnet link" - copy link location, then in your uTorrent Ctrl + U or "File - Add torrent from url" and paste link.
Thanks again Tibalt! Used to be an EZTV fan, but you're more reliable! :)
ESSA PORRA DE ARQUIVO TA COM PAU ..NOT DownLOAD...
I'm so sorry for that error, but I don't even know what that means. I've reported to the pirate bay admins but got no answer yet(
